title: webui-malefunction after integrating files with "php console.php files:scan --all"
body:
### expected behaviour
tell us what should happen
files are uploaded to a server manually and made visible via /owncloud/php console.php files:scan --all
files and folders uploaded thisway should be removable also via webinterface

### actual behaviour
upload files into a desired users files: /owncloud/data/user/files
files uploaded via php console.php files:scan --all
can not be removed manually via webui


### steps to reproduce
1. upload files or a thick folder manually and make visible insidowncloud by calling: 'php console.php files:scan --all'
2. open webui, see the uploaded file
3. hover over the place where the other files can be deleted
4. no symbol appeares, delete not possible

### server configuration
operating system:
ubuntu 13.04 64 bit

web server: 
apache 2.2.22

database:
mysql 5.5.32

php version:
5.4.9.

owncloud version:
5.0.11 rc2

### client configuration
browser: mozilla
mozilla 24.0
operating system: ubuntu 13.04 / localhost and win864 bit


### logs
#### web server error log
```
insert your webserver log here (log - level: debug)
{"app":"core","message":"redirecttodefaultpage: http:\/\/localhost\/5011\/owncloud\/index.php\/apps\/files","level":0,"time":"2013-09-24t15:15:06+00:00"}
